sm.description: Applied as max width to text components to work around Figma limitations

md.description: Applied as max width to text components to work around Figma limitations

lg.description: Applied as max width to text components to work around Figma limitations

default.description:
This token matches a design property in Figma that does not have a direct CSS equivellent. In this system it will always be a zero value token, and designers should use a line break to create paragraph spacing which better matches how

are written in code.

sm.description: Applied as min width to text components to work around Figma limitations

md.description: Applied as max width to text components to work around Figma limitations

lg.description: Applied as max width to text components to work around Figma limitations

default.description: There is no proper way to define a responsive value for this property so it will remain a zero property value in this system.
